description: Hot Buttered Rum is a drink that originated in the 18th century. It's traditionally made with rum, hot water, sugar, and butter, stirred together to create a creamy hot mixture. There are many variations of this hot drink - some recipes include nutmeg or cinnamon for flavor.
name: Hot Buttered Rum
